item.title: 选股者在人工智能颠覆浪潮中发现机遇
item.description:
多头表示，部分股票因市场担忧人工智能的影响而遭过度抛售。【原文：

Selloffs have been overdone for some stocks on fears of AI’s impact, bulls say.

】

item.title: 加拿大拥抱亚洲以拯救受美国关税挤压的汽车核心产业
item.description:
美国汽车制造商目前仅占加拿大组装汽车总量的四分之一。随着马克·卡尼领导的政府将目光投向海外，这些企业正逐渐失去影响力。

【原文：

US automakers now make just a quarter of the cars assembled in Canada. They’re losing influence with Mark Carney’s government, which is looking overseas.

】

item.title: 委内瑞拉西斯内罗斯集团筹集10亿美元重建基金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，委内瑞拉商界最具权势家族之一的掌门人阿德里安娜·西斯内罗斯正牵头筹集10亿美元，用于设立私募股权基金，投资于这个饱受危机蹂躏、正寻求重建的国家。【原文：Adriana Cisneros, head of one of the Venezuelan business community’s most powerful families, is leading efforts to raise $1 billion for a private equity fund to invest in the crisis-ravaged nation as it seeks to rebuild, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Shein因销售儿童样貌性爱玩偶面临欧盟调查及罚款风险
item.description: Shein因在该中国电商平台销售儿童样貌的性爱玩偶，面临欧盟巨额罚款风险，监管机构已就此展开全面调查。【原文：Shein risks hefty European Union penalties after regulators opened a full-scale probe into sales of child-like sex dolls on the Chinese e-commerce platform.】

item.title: 随着法规变更，瑞典能源巨头Vattenfall将退出法国能源零售市场
item.description: 瑞典能源公司Vattenfall AB正准备退出法国能源零售市场，因电价持续下跌，且供应商已无法从法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）购买折扣电价。【原文：Swedish utility Vattenfall AB is poised to exit the French energy retail market, as prices decline and suppliers no longer have the option to buy discounted power from Electricite de France SA.】

item.title: 选股者在市场人工智能恐慌中迎来闪光时刻
item.description: 对人工智能的恐惧正在美国股市肆虐。对于选股者而言，现在或许正是贪婪的时机。【原文：AI fear is running amok in the US equity market. For stock pickers, now might be the time to get greedy.】

item.title: 南非电力交易商要求为埃斯孔公司改革制定路线图
item.description: 南非电力交易商要求将国营电力公司埃斯康控股有限公司的"最终状态"明确定义，作为开放电力市场的必要措施。【原文：South African electricity traders want the “end state” of utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. defined as a necessary measure to open up the power market.】

item.title: 波罗的海海域多年未见的严寒天气威胁削减俄罗斯大宗商品出口
item.description: 俄罗斯波罗的海主要商品港口周边海域出现15年来最广阔的海冰覆盖，可能因缺乏能应对这种海况的船舶而限制该国部分大规模出口计划。【原文：The most extensive sea ice in 15 years around Russia’s key Baltic Sea commodity ports could curb a chunk of the nation’s vast exports program because of a shortage of vessels that can cope with the conditions.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心意外恶化，经济复苏受挫
item.description: 德国投资者信心指数2月意外下滑，这令市场对欧洲最大经济体即将迎来强劲复苏的预期有所降温。【原文：German investor optimism unexpectedly fell in February, tempering hopes that Europe’s largest economy is on the cusp of a strong revival.】

item.title: 洲际酒店集团宣布9.5亿美元股票回购计划，首席财务官看好中美市场增长前景
item.description: 洲际酒店集团宣布启动9.5亿美元的股票回购计划，此举表明其对中国旅游业复苏充满信心，并对美国市场保持乐观态度。【原文：Intercontinental Hotels Group Plc launched a $950 million share buyback program as it signaled confidence in a travel recovery in China and remains optimistic about the US market.】

item.title: 印度计划两年内投入2000亿美元发展人工智能
item.description: 印度联邦政府一位高级部长表示，该国预计在两年内吸引超过2000亿美元的人工智能驱动型投资，这凸显了这个全球人口最多国家在新技术领域日益高涨的雄心。【原文：India expects to attract more than $200 billion in artificial intelligence-driven investments over the course of two years, a top federal minister said, underscoring the world’s most populous nation’s surging ambitions in the new technology.】

item.title: 小麦价格下跌，交易清淡且供应充足迹象显现
item.description: 小麦价格跌至近一周低点，因交易商评估美国小麦种植区在寒流过后将出现更干燥、更温暖的天气，这提振了供应前景。【原文：Wheat fell to the lowest in nearly a week as traders assessed the prospect of drier and warmer weather across US wheat-growing areas after a cold snap, boosting the supply outlook.】

item.title: 南非失业率降至2020年以来最低水平
item.description: 南非第四季度失业率降至五年多来最低水平，社区与社会服务及建筑行业新增就业岗位。【原文：South Africa’s unemployment rate dropped to the lowest level in more than five years in the fourth quarter, as the community and social services and construction sectors added workers.】

item.title: 三井住友银行、宝盛银行等机构在印度设立科技中心
item.description: 知情人士透露，包括三井住友银行和宝盛集团在内的全球金融机构正计划通过设立全球能力中心来扩大在印度的业务。【原文：Global financial firms, including Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. and Julius Baer Group, are planning to expand in India by setting up global capability centers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Boohoo计划筹集3500万英镑，零售商正与贷款方进行谈判
item.description: Boohoo集团正计划增发股权并与贷款方展开谈判，这家在线服装零售商正试图扭转业务局面。【原文：Boohoo Group Plc is planning to raise equity and hold talks with lenders as the online clothing retailer tries to turn around the business.】

item.title: 西班牙首相要求调查社交媒体上的儿童图片
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗·桑切斯表示，他正动用特殊公共利益权力，要求该国检察机关对X平台、TikTok及Meta Platforms公司展开调查，因其涉嫌发布儿童性虐待材料。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said he is using special public-interest powers to ask the country’s prosecutor office to investigate X, TikTok and Meta Platforms Inc. over alleged publication of child sexual abuse material.】

item.title: 国际清算银行称，银行监管机构正处于评估SRT债务的初期阶段
item.description: 巴塞尔银行监管委员会呼吁加强银行监管机构与监管部门之间的合作，以评估银行日益增长的风险转移行为。【原文：The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision called for closer cooperation between banking supervisors and regulators as it assesses the growing use of risk transfers by banks.】

item.title: 印度亿万富豪与全球科技巨头在人工智能峰会上寻觅人才
item.description: 随着全球企业加大投资力度，印度人工智能工具与应用的开发竞赛日趋激烈，该国两大最大企业集团正将正在举行的印度人工智能峰会作为招募基地，物色并遴选年轻工程师。【原文：India’s two largest conglomerates are using the ongoing India AI summit as a recruiting ground to scout and handpick young engineers, as the race to build AI tools and applications has intensified in the country with global players ramping up investments.】

item.title: 印度正讨论实施基于年龄的社交媒体限制，部长称
item.description: 印度科技部长阿什温尼·瓦伊什纳周二表示，该国正就社交媒体年龄限制问题与科技公司展开磋商，当前公众对这类限制措施的讨论日益升温。【原文：India is talking to technology companies regarding restrictions around age-based access to social media, Technology Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said Tuesday, as the public debate on such curbs rises.】

item.title: 联合国机构称美国贸易关税惩罚南非葡萄酒生产商
item.description: 美国对南非农产品征收的关税正推高南非葡萄酒在世界最大市场的价格，导致其竞争力下降，出口量减少。【原文：Tariffs imposed on South African agricultural products by the US are spiking the price of South African wine in the world’s biggest market, making it less competitive and reducing export volumes.】

item.title: 斯万特松认为未来几年瑞典不会加入欧元区
item.description: 瑞典财政部长伊丽莎白·斯万特松表示，尽管关于加入欧元区利弊的讨论日益热烈，但瑞典在近期内不会加入欧元区。【原文：Sweden won’t be joining the euro in the near future even as a debate on the merits of such a move is gathering pace, according to Finance Minister Elisabeth Svantesson.】

item.title: 美元走强，因交易员质疑美联储三次降息的定价
item.description: 美元连续第二日小幅走高，无视市场定价所暗示的今年美联储将降息约三次的预期。【原文：The dollar is edging higher for a second day, shrugging off market pricing that implies roughly three Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 印度太阳能制造业过剩，繁荣转为供过于求
item.description: 印度太阳能制造业正成为其自身成功的牺牲品。【原文：India’s solar manufacturing industry is becoming a victim of its own success.】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，交易员押注英国央行2026年将两次降息
item.description: 英国失业率升至近五年高位，且工资增长放缓，交易员们因此加大押注英国央行将进一步降息。【原文：Traders increased their bets on more Bank of England interest-rate cuts after UK unemployment rose to a near five-year high and wage growth cooled.】

item.title: 意大利检方调查财务报表，BFF股价暴跌
item.description: BFF银行在米兰股市下跌，此前该公司证实检察官已对这家专业贷款机构展开调查。【原文：BFF Bank SpA fell in Milan trading after confirming a report that prosecutors opened an investigation into the specialist lender.】

item.title: 海湾地区第三大银行领投房地产应用融资轮
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的分权式房产投资平台Stake在第二轮融资中筹集了3100万美元，这笔资金将助力该分权式产权公司拓展在沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国的业务，并深化对支撑这些市场的技术投入。【原文：Stake, a Dubai-based fractional property investment platform, raised $31 million in a second fund-raising round that will help the fractional ownership firm expand its operations in Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates and dig deeper into technology supporting the markets.】

item.title: 阿达尼计划到2035年在人工智能数据中心投资1000亿美元
item.description: 阿达尼集团计划到2035年投资1000亿美元，开发绿色能源驱动、具备人工智能就绪能力的数据中心。亿万富翁高塔姆·阿达尼正试图借势印度作为人工智能和云计算枢纽的崛起。【原文：Adani Group plans to invest $100 billion by 2035 to develop green-powered, AI-ready data centers as billionaire Gautam Adani seeks to capitalize on India’s emergence as a hub for artificial intelligence and cloud computing.】

item.title: 英国失业率逼近五年高位，薪资压力有所缓解
item.description: 英国失业率升至疫情以来最高水平，工资增长放缓，劳动力市场持续疲软，为春季可能降息埋下伏笔。【原文：UK unemployment reached its highest since the pandemic and wage growth eased as the labor market continued to weaken, setting up a potential interest-rate cut by the spring.】

item.title: Anthropic与Infosys将为企业打造定制化人工智能代理
item.description: 人类本位PBC公司已与印度科技企业印孚瑟斯有限公司建立合作关系，共同为电信、金融服务等多个领域的企业开发先进的人工智能解决方案。【原文：Anthropic PBC has partnered Indian technology firm Infosys Ltd. to develop advanced artificial intelligence solutions for companies across sectors including telecommunications and financial services.】

item.title: 英国12月工资增长放缓幅度超预期
